StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: Proc2092
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PackageId uniqueiden..er, @LockedBy varchar(100) ) AS
DECLARE @retVal int
--If the package is already locked by the reques.ng user, do nothing and return true. IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[ACP].[Package] WHERE PackageId = @PackageId AND [Locked] = 1 AND [LockedBy] = @LockedBy) BEGIN SET @retVal = 1 END ELSE BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [ACP].[ACP].[Package] WHERE PackageId = @PackageId AND LockedBy IS NULL) BEGIN -- If the record is not locked, lock it. UPDATE [ACP].[ACP].[Package] SET [Locked] = 1, [LockedBy] = @LockedBy, [DateLocked] = GetDate() WHERE [PackageId] = @PackageId AND [Locked] = 0 AND LockedBy IS NULL
SET @retVal = 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @retVal = 0 END END
SELECT @retVal
